description: From un- (prefix meaning ‘not’) +‎ wavering (“being in doubt, indecisive”).

adjectives.description: unwavering (comparative more unwavering, superlative most unwavering)

examples: Synonyms: constant, nonwavering, staunch, steadfast, strong-handed, tough-minded, unshakable, unshaking

entries.meaning: Not doubting or unsure; decisive, firm, resolute.
examples: Synonyms: certain, sure; see also Thesaurus:certain
Antonyms: indecisive, in two minds, irresolute, of two minds, uncertain, undecided, vacillating, wavering
